parameters.definition: Units of wood required to make a model train
Units of paint required to make a model train
Units of wood required to make a model plane
Units of paint required to make a model plane

description: A hobbyist makes model trains and planes using wood and paint. A model train requires \param{WoodTrain} units of wood and \param{PaintTrain} units of paint. A model plane requires \param{WoodPlane} units of wood and \param{PaintPlane} units of paint. The hobbyist has available \param{TotalWood} units of wood and \param{TotalPaint} units of paint. If the profit per model train is $\param{ProfitTrain} and the profit per model plane is $\param{ProfitPlane}, how many of each should be made to maximize his profit?
